amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to strike Sec. 107, which prohibits funds from being used to require a permit for the discharge of dredged or fill material under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Beyer.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
